name: Achtung! Cthulhu Tactics
description: Challenge the horrifying reign of Nazi terror and battle an immortal evil in Achtung! Cthulhu Tactics; a turn-based tactical strategy game set in the award-winning Achtung! Cthulhu universe.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: i5-4570 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 1050 GTX Ti 4GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
